duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive customer experience transformation & intimacy and lead the services strategy within our largest accounts.
Increase Premium Services offerings and penetration within the customer base.
Provide leadership in the customer account with respect to Cisco Services and drive the execution of customer/partner facing activities to conclusion in a quality, timely, and appropriate manner.
Develop a deep knowledge of the customer and their needs to ensure the provision of a first-class solution.
Advise the sales team and/or partner on the best services solution to achieve customer outcomes and value realization throughout the customer lifecycle.
Collaborate with the extended account team to develop services strategies and drive new opportunities to closure.
Collaborate and drive cross-functional teams within Cisco through influence to desired outcomes.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in technology related fields or marketing/management
